items.name: Phool Patasha
items.description: A traditional Sindhi dish made with dried lotus seed, peas and potatoes in a flavourful gravy and sindhi garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sindhi Lamb Curry
items.description: A traditional dish from the Sindhi cuisine, features tender pieces of lamb slow-cooked in a rich and aromatic gravy, showcasing the flavors of the region's culinary heritage.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice or 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Aloo Tuk
items.description: A crispy sindhi snack made of boiled potatoes, which are flattened and deep fried and topped with spices and fresh coriander.

items.name: Chaunsa
items.description: A dal preparation from Uttarakhand made with urad dal mixed with different spices and ghee. Served with rice

items.name: Nagpuri Shimla Mirch Zunka
items.description: A Indian dish made with bell peppers (Shimla Mirch) and gram flour (besan), seasoned with spices for a flavorful and spicy dish.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2  bhakri (rice flour flatbread) + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Saoji Lamb Curry
items.description: A traditional and highly spicy meat curry from the Vidarbha region of Maharashtra, India. It's known for its intense heat and robust flavors. This curry is made using lamb and a blend of fiery spices, including chili peppers, black pepper, and other spices. It's  cooked with ingredients like dry coconut, poppy seeds, and sesame seeds, which give it a unique texture and flavor.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice or 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Dadpe Pohe
items.description: A Maharashtrian dish made with soaked flattened rice mixed with onions, tomatoes, and a zesty blend of spices as a flavorful snack.

items.name: Masala Kichidi
items.description: A flavorful and nutritious Indian one-pot dish made with a combination of rice and lentils (usually moong dal), along with a variety of spices and vegetables. It's a popular comfort food and a healthier alternative to regular rice dishes. The spices and vegetables added to khichdi give it a rich, aromatic flavor, making it a satisfying and wholesome meal.

items.name: Kerala Vegetable Stew
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish known for its mild and aromatic flavors. It's made by simmering mixed vegetables in a coconut milk-based gravy and is typically seasoned with spices like curry leaves, ginger, and green chilies.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kerala Beef Curry
items.description: A delicious south indian beef curry dish cooked with onion, tomato, garlic, ginger and fresh spices topped with fresh coriander and garam masala
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parotta + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Plantain Bhajji
items.description: A popular Indian snack or side dish made from plantains. The bananas are thinly sliced or diced and then coated with a spiced gram flour batter. They are deep-fried until crispy and golden brown, resulting in a crunchy and flavorful snack. Served with a side of chutney.

items.name: Khada Pav Bhaji
items.description: A variation of the popular Indian street food dish, Pav Bhaji. "Khada" means "whole" or "chunky," and in this version, the vegetables are left chunky and not mashed as finely as in traditional Pav Bhaji.  Served with 2 buttered pav.

items.name: Chettinad Mushroom Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and spicy South Indian rice dish that incorporates mushrooms as the main ingredient. It's known for its rich and aromatic blend of Chettinad spices and is popular in Chettinad cuisine, which hails from the Chettinad region of Tamil Nadu. This biryani is made by cooking mushrooms and rice with a mixture of aromatic spices and herbs, resulting in a delicious and satisfying one-pot meal. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad.

items.name: Chettinad Chicken Biryani
items.description: An amazing biryani from Kerala made with a meledy of unique spices cooked with juicy chicken and fragrant basmati rice with freshly ground Chettinad spice paste and caramalised onions. Served with yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Aloo Paratha
items.description: Wholewheat Indian flatbread stuffed with a mixture of mashed potato, onion, chillies and spices. Served with achar and a side on onion & tomato chutney. (2 parathas)

items.name: Veg Fried Rice
items.description: Assorted veggies cooked with long grain basmati rice with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a wholesome dish with veg manchurian gravy by the side

items.name: Chicken Fried Rice
items.description: Stir fried chicken and assorted veggies cooked with long grain basmati rice with flavourful chinese sauces and aromatic spices.
items.extra: make it a wholesome dish with chicken manchurian gravy by the side

items.name: Chicken 65
items.description: A popular Indian appetizer or snack known for its spicy and flavorful taste. It is made with bite-sized pieces of chicken, marinated in a blend of spices such as red chili powder, turmeric, ginger-garlic paste, and other aromatic seasonings. The marinated chicken is then deep-fried until crispy and golden

items.name: Puliodarai
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish that features a tangy and spicy tamarind-flavored rice. It's made by cooking rice and then mixing it with a spiced tamarind paste and mustard seeds, fenugreek seeds, curry leaves, and various spices.

items.name: Goan Veg Caldin
items.description: A mildly spiced and creamy curry from Goan cuisine. It features a combination of vegetables such as potatoes, carrots and beans, cooked in a coconut milk based sauce that is flavored with spices like turmeric, cumin and coriander. The dish has a slightly tangy and creamy flavor, making it a delightful and comforting option for those who prefer vegetarian dishes with a coastal Indian influence.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Goan Prawns Caldin
items.description: A delicious and mildly spiced prawn curry that hails from the coastal state of Goa in India. It's known for its creamy and coconut-based gravy, which is flavored with aromatic spices and herbs. This curry is less spicy compared to some other Goan dishes, making it suitable for those who prefer milder flavors.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Garlic Potato Bites
items.description: A delicious snack made with bite-sized potato pieces infused with the aromatic flavors of garlic.

items.name: Missal Pav
items.description: A popular street food of Mumbai. Mixed sprouts boiled and cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chilles and spicy masala. Topped with some fresh coriander. Served with 2 buns, farsan and onions

items.name: Paneer Bhuna Masala
items.description: A rich and flavorful curry that is prepared by sautéing paneer in a thick, spicy and aromatic tomato based gravy. The term "bhuna" refers to the cooking process, which involves slow cooking and roasting the ingredients to enhance the flavors.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Chicken Bhuna Masala
items.description: A North Indian dish made by cooking chicken in a thick, spicy onion tomato based gravy with spices and fresh garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Gobi 65
items.description: Cauliflower florets that are marinated in a spicy and flavorful batter and then deep-fried until crispy and golden brown.

items.name: Kadhi Chawal
items.description: Kadhi is a yogurt based gravy typically made with a mixture of yogurt, besan (gram flour), and spices. Served with chawal (rice).

items.name: Tamil Style Sambar
items.description: A tangy and flavorful lentil-based stew made with a mix of vegetables, toor dal (pigeon pea lentils), and a special spice blend called sambar powder.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + papad

items.name: Chicken Kizhi Parotha
items.description: Shredded (layered Indian bread) sautéed with a flavorful mixture of chicken, spices, onions and tomatoes. The dish is known for its spicy and savory flavors, making it a favorite among those who enjoy robust and hearty street food

items.name: Dahi Bhalle
items.description: A street food dish from Delhi. Fried lentil balls topped with chillies & spiced yogurt, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy chutney and crispy boondi. (3 bhalle)

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Ulavacharu Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish that originates from the Telugu cuisine of Andhra Pradesh. This biryani is unique because it features a spicy and tangy horse gram soup known as "ulavacharu" as a key ingredient in the preparation. The ulavacharu is used to infuse the rice with its distinctive flavors, resulting in a savory and satisfying biryani. Served with raita + papad

items.name: Vijaywada Biryani
items.description: A regional variation of Biryani, that originates from the city of Vijayawada in Andhra Pradesh. This style of biryani is characterized by its spicy and flavorful taste. It features marinated chicken pieces, fragrant spices, and aromatic herbs, all layered with long-grain basmati rice and slow-cooked to perfection. The key distinction of Vijayawada Biryani is the use of spicy red and green chilies, which give it its distinct heat and flavor. Served with raita + papad

items.name: Cheese Corn Balls
items.description: Boiled potatoes mixed with cheese, paneer and green chillies coated with breadbrumbs and deep fried. Served with side of tomato ketchup. (6 pieces)

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Burnt Garlic Fried Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish made with assorted veggies and rice cooked in chinese sauces and topped with crispy burnt garlic flakes.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of paneer manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Burnt Garlic Fried Rice
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies, boneless chicken and rice cooked in chinese sauces and topped with crispy burnt garlic flakes.
items.extra: make it more delicious with a side of chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Bread Chaat
items.description: A popular and easy-to-make Indian street food snack. It's made using slices of bread that are toasted until they are crispy and then topped with a mixture of spicy and tangy ingredients. The toppings include chopped onions, tomatoes, green chilies, chaat masala, tamarind chutney, and fresh coriander leaves.

items.name: Coconut Rice
items.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked in ghee with cashew, curry leaves, dried chilli and fresh coconut, tempered with mustard seeds.
